title: Japanese science project based on CLIL and FPI: Problem-based learning curriculum

context.prior_knowledge: Basic comprehension of Japanese vocabulary and grammar, along with introductory knowledge in science
context.additional_context: Strengthening integrated language and content competencies for science professionals to perform science communication in Japanese.

learning_goals: Learners can interpret Japanese scientific texts with over 70% accuracy
Learners can draft Japanese reports on scientific topics through CLIL-based PBL activities
Learners can develop and present Japanese scientific presentations using FPI's problem-centered approach
Learners can appropriately use over 50 Japanese scientific terms in context during group collaboration

resources: Access rights to Japanese science database
Japanese reading materials package on scientific topics

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
